rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Now we've got refugees both from
Acedia and Superbia.

rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0002
rows.name:
They're having a Torigonda concert
for them. Anything to ease their
sorrows, they said.

rows.label: tlk41200126_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I know it's hard for them, but I hope
they get to enjoy the concert at least...
